{{Infobox Network Adapter |image1 = |image1_size = |caption = |caption2 = |pp = |sp = |dl = |wikidevi = |wikipedia = |brand = Intel |model = 622 |submodelappend = |submodel = ANHMW |revision = |subrevision = |model_part_num = |page_start_date = June 26, 2010 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/Intel_Centrino_Advanced-N_6200_(622ANHMW) |sernum = |wlclass = AN600 |series = |if = Mini PCIe |if_bus_version = |ifconnector = |formfactor = (half) |vendor_id = 8086 |device_id = 422c |subvendor_id = 8086 |subdevice_id = 1321 |id_string = |windosid = |fcc_id = PD9622ANHU,PD9622ANH |icid = |boardid = |ecc_id = |oui = 00:15:00, 00:23:14, 00:27:10, 18:3D:A2 |chip1 = Intel;JC82546MDE; |chip2 = Intel;JC82546RDE; |chip3 = |chip4 = |antconn = U.FL |antenna = |txchains = 2 |rxchains = 2 |sstreams = 2 |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n |802.11n = 300/300 |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |802.11a = 54 |wififreq = 2.4 or 5 |receive_sens = |transmit_power = |linuxdriv = |windriv = |is_manuf = No |manuf = |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |addchip = |flags = DFS, |802dot11_protocols = abgn |accessible_UART = No |accessible_JTAG = |category = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 09/17/2009 |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China |powledcolor = |connactled = |spdledcolor = |leddupcolor = |dimmin = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== 2x2 MIMO
FCC ID PD9622ANH submissions refer to this device as the 'Centrino Ultimate-N 6200'. Tested cards factoring into this entry include (but are not necessarily limited to)... *Card for an unknown vendor **PCI ID: 8086:422c (8086:1301) **OUI: 18:3D:A2 *An engineering sample (''Go/No Go'' testing unit) **PCI ID: 8086:422c (8086:1301) **MAC: 00:15:00:5A:90:68 **WF EP: 0X434, TA: E72212-002, Cfg: 27.7 **Dated '''Jul-21-2009''' Output of '''sudo lspci -vvnnq -d 8086:422c''' [http://pastebin.com/hG4pdEKR here], or [https://cloud.openmailbox.org/public.php?service=files&t=7d740a46de62b7a206ab86e6f8bfa58b&download here]. ==Links of Interest== [http://download.intel.com/network/connectivity/products/prodbrf/323016.pdf Product Brief] ==Pictures==
'''User [[User:MYself]]'s Images''' File:622ANHMW_top.jpg| File:622ANHMW_bottom.jpg| File:622ANHMW_bottom-nosticker.jpg|
[[Has images::internal| ]][[Has images::label| ]] ==Notes== ===pci ids === 422c Centrino Advanced-N 6200 8086 1301 Centrino Advanced-N 6200 2x2 AGN 8086 1306 Centrino Advanced-N 6200 2x2 ABG 8086 1307 Centrino Advanced-N 6200 2x2 BG 8086 1321 Centrino Advanced-N 6200 2x2 AGN 8086 1326 Centrino Advanced-N 6200 2x2 ABG 4239 Centrino Advanced-N 6200 8086 1311 Centrino Advanced-N 6200 2x2 AGN 8086 1316 Centrino Advanced-N 6200 2x2 ABG ===Variants === 622ANHMW (supports 802.11a/b/g/n) 622AGHRU (supports 802.11a/b/g) 622BGHMW (supports 802.11b/g) [[Category:English Documentation]]
